mapper.sql: id, site_id, live_id, order_no, username, bet_time, pay_amount, bet_amount, valid_amount, type, create_time, update_time

select
distinct
from temp_audit_total
order by ${orderByClause}

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update temp_audit_total set site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, live_id = #{liveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bet_time = #{betTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bet_amount = #{betAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, valid_amount = #{validAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update temp_audit_total set bet_time = #{betTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bet_amount = #{betAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, valid_amount = #{validAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into audit_total_${siteId} (live_id,order_no,username,bet_time,pay_amount,bet_amount, valid_amount,type,create_time,update_time,game_name) values ( #{item.liveId}, #{item.orderNo}, #{item.username}, #{item.betTime}, #{item.payAmount}, #{item.betAmount}, #{item.validAmount}, #{item.type}, now(), null,#{item.gameName}) on duplicate key update live_id = values(live_id),order_no = values(order_no), username = values(username),bet_time = values(bet_time), bet_amount = bet_amount+values(bet_amount), pay_amount = pay_amount+values(pay_amount), valid_amount = valid_amount+values(valid_amount), type = values(type),update_time = now(),game_name = values(game_name)

insert into audit_total_${siteId} (live_id,order_no,username,bet_time,pay_amount,bet_amount, valid_amount,type,create_time,update_time,game_name) values
(#{item.liveId}, #{item.orderNo}, #{item.username}, #{item.betTime}, #{item.payAmount}, #{item.betAmount}, #{item.validAmount}, #{item.type}, now(), null,#{item.gameName})
on duplicate key update live_id = values(live_id), order_no = values(order_no), username = values(username), bet_time = values(bet_time), pay_amount = values(pay_amount), bet_amount = values(bet_amount), valid_amount = values(valid_amount), type = values(type), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.select: select username, SUM(CASE WHEN type=1 then valid_amount else 0 END) as live_valid_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN type=2 then valid_amount else 0 END) as sport_valid_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN type=3 THEN valid_amount else 0 END) as lotto_valid_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN type=4 THEN valid_amount ELSE 0 END) as jv_valid_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN type=5 THEN valid_amount ELSE 0 END) as chess_valid_amount, SUM(valid_amount) as total_valid_amount from audit_total_#{siteId} a where a.username=#{userName} and a.bet_time>=#{start_time} and a.bet_time<=#{end_time}
